reviews.review: Comunidade muito tóxica, recheada de cheaters. Precisa urgentemente de uma atualização quanto a esse quesito.
fun stoB ban people not chit

team based games are always fun in my opinion. although this game could have a fairly toxic community at times, the times where you just get the right group of people queued up with you make for memorable moments.
Good game if you dont get mad

This game is on the bad way by nerfing the sg 553, the anticheat sucks ass cause you play against cheaters almost every game and if you are better then other people you get reported, which gives you low trustfactor and then you go against even more cheaters.
Sem palavras! Melhor jogo de FPS ja criado.
Já jogo cs há 4 anos e é um jogo simplesmente top
xiter pra um krl ,mas o jogo eh muito bom , crianca chata se achando o simple ,mais boludo que oxigenio
Juego muy bueno y divertido.  Recomendado jugar con amigos.
couldnt even play one game. terrible

One of my favorite games of all time. it's what starting my gaming off, and is something that I am always willing to play at almost anytime.

Honestly love this game, only has one map though (Nuke) but it's a great one. This game consumed my entire life and I lost my life savings, wife and kids, and my parents put me up for adoption. However, when I get that no scope with the awp by golly it's all worth it.
Great game especially with friends, highly recommended and fun
Et dejligt spil i kan komme langt i det giv det et try :D

fun, sometimes toxic voice and text chat, but what do you expect. it's a game on pc. really fun and would recommend. would also recommend doing some studying up before playing as well. very competitive and easy to get mad at if you don't know what you are doing. all in all, really good and fun game. don't have to have the craziest pc setup or lots of money to play.
